00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTBOUNDARYCONDITIONSCONTAINER_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTBOUNDARYCONDITIONSCONTAINER_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include <map>
00032 #include <set>
00033 #include "AbstractBoundaryCondition.hpp"
00034 #include "Node.hpp"
00035 //#include "ConstBoundaryCondition.hpp"
00036 //#include "TetrahedralMesh.hpp"
00037 //#include "LinearSystem.hpp"
00038 //#include "PetscException.hpp"
00039 
00040 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00041 struct LessThanNode
00042 {
00043     bool operator()(const Node<SPACE_DIM> * const &n1, const Node<SPACE_DIM> * const &n2)
00044     {
00045         return (n1->GetIndex() < n2->GetIndex() );
00046     }
00047 };
00048 
00049 template<unsigned ELEM_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM, unsigned PROBLEM_DIM>
00050 class AbstractBoundaryConditionsContainer
00051 {
00052 protected:
00053     std::map< const Node<SPACE_DIM> *, const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*, LessThanNode<SPACE_DIM> >
00054     *mpDirichletMap[PROBLEM_DIM]; 
00056     typename std::map< const Node<SPACE_DIM> *, const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*, LessThanNode<SPACE_DIM> >::const_iterator
00057     mDirichIterator; 
00059 public:
00063     AbstractBoundaryConditionsContainer();
00064 
00065 
00066     ~AbstractBoundaryConditionsContainer();
00067 
00077     bool HasDirichletBoundaryConditions();
00078     
00079 
00080     void DeleteDirichletBoundaryConditions(std::set<const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*> deletedConditions = std::set<const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*>());
00081     
00082 
00090     double GetDirichletBCValue(const Node<SPACE_DIM>* pBoundaryNode, unsigned indexOfUnknown = 0);
00091  
00097     bool HasDirichletBoundaryCondition(const Node<SPACE_DIM>* pNode, unsigned indexOfUnknown = 0);
00098 };
00099 
00100 #endif /*ABSTRACTBOUNDARYCONDITIONSCONTAINER_HPP_*/
